Guts Level

The Guts Level (floors 26-30, depths GUTS) is an optional dungeon level that appears after completing the main dungeon bosses in Remixed Dungeon. It's a challenging area with unique mechanics and powerful enemies.

Description

  • Extra challenging content that appears after beating the main dungeon
  • Features unique enemies and mechanics not found elsewhere
  • Higher difficulty than the main dungeon, with floors 26-30
  • Based on the “Old God” theme where you walk on living flesh
  • Unique tileset with dried shrubs, weird slimy liquid, and wounded-looking walls

Enemies

  • Suspicious Rat - A mysterious variant of regular rats that transforms when threatened
  • Zombie Gnoll - Undead gnolls with special mechanics
  • Larva - Small creatures that appear in increasing numbers on deeper floors
  • Worm - Long-range attacking enemies
  • Scorpio - Arachnid enemies with dangerous attacks
  • Eye - Floating eye enemies with magical attacks
  • Succubus - Charismatic enemies in the deeper areas
  • Spirit of Pain - Powerful spirit enemies
  • Treacherous Spirit - Quest-related mini-boss on floor 27
  • Mimic Amulet - A mimic that masquerades as a valuable amulet
  • Nightmare - Powerful enemy with special abilities
  • Rotting Fist - Powerful boss-like enemy
  • Burning Fist - Powerful boss-like enemy
  • Yog's Brain - Component of the Yog boss fight
  • Yog's Heart - Component of the Yog boss fight
  • Yog's Teeth - Component of the Yog boss fight
  • Yog's Eye - Component of the Yog boss fight

Features

  • Special mechanics and challenges
  • Unique treasures and items, including Guts-specific equipment
  • High-risk, high-reward gameplay
  • Enemies with special abilities
  • Unique tileset featuring dried shrubs, weird slimy liquid, and wounded-looking walls
  • Bookshelves completely covered in thick, fleshy web with no accessible books

Strategy

  • Prepare thoroughly before entering (good equipment, potions, etc.)
  • Expect enemies with unfamiliar abilities
  • Resource management is crucial
  • Different tactics from regular dungeon levels may be needed
  • Be aware that the level is designed for late-game characters

Spawn Rates by Floor

  • Floor 26: SuspiciousRat:1, ZombieGnoll:2, Worm:0.3, Succubus:0.2, Scorpio:0.2, Eye:0.1 - Note: Higher Succubus rate added recently
  • Floor 27: SuspiciousRat:2, ZombieGnoll:1, Worm:1, Eye: Removed recently
  • Floor 28: SuspiciousRat:1, ZombieGnoll:1, Worm:2, Larva:1 - First floor with Larva spawns
  • Floor 29: SuspiciousRat:2, ZombieGnoll:1, Worm:2, Larva:2
  • Floor 30: SuspiciousRat:1, ZombieGnoll:1, Worm:2, Larva:3 - Maximum Larva spawns (3)

Access

  • Unlocked after defeating the King (The Dwarven King) on floor 19
  • Follows the Halls (Demon Halls) level after defeating Yog-Dzewa
  • Part of the extended endgame content

Story

  • “Defeated, shattered in pieces, but not completely destroyed, the Old God was sealed away in the deepest levels of the dungeon. But recently the seal was broken, leaving passage, to the demon's nest, wide open. The nightmarish monsters, created by the Old God in his slumber was so numerous, that provided no way to escape they were forced to fuse together to form these grotesque halls. And as you walk upon their living flesh you can feel the beat of an Old God's heart echoing through them.”

Related Items

  • Heart of Darkness - Special item dropped by Treacherous Spirit
  • Pseudo Amulet - Special item found in Guts
  • Gothic Armor - Guts-specific armor obtainable from shops
  • Claymore - Guts-specific weapon
  • Halberd - Guts-specific weapon
  • Composite Crossbow - Guts-specific weapon
  • Ruby Crossbow - Guts-specific weapon
  • Wooden Crossbow - Guts-specific weapon

Content Verification

* Information source: Java class GutsLevel.java and Bestiary config * Spawn rates: Updated based on Bestiary.json changes - As of December 2025, Larva spawns added to floors 28-30 with increasing numbers, and floor 26 now has higher Succubus rate and floor 27 no longer has Eyes * Last updated: December 2025, source: Remixed Dungeon 1.9.3
